Care of the newborn
Routine nasal or oral 
suction
47. Suctioning of the mouth and nose should not be 
performed in the case of neonates born through clear 
amniotic fluid who start breathing on their own after 
birth.
Not recommended
Skin-to-skin contact 48. Newborns without complications should be kept in 
skin-to-skin contact with their mothers during the first 
hour after birth to prevent hypothermia and promote 
breastfeeding.
Recommended
